goals__remit: EPC Centro de Proyectos is a SME dedicated to the consultancy for the public sector. The "EURUPEAN PROJETS CENTER" aims to facilitate the path for the entities of the Ultraperipheral Regions helping them in the development of strategic projects. The main activity is consultancy for public administration in the management and development of cooperation projects financed by European funds (INTERREG,ERASMUS+,URBACT)
